/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a two-lane highway stretching into the distance, flanked by lush greenery on both sides. The road, a ribbon of gray, is marked with a white dashed line running down its center, guiding the way forward. On the right side of the road, a red car is parked, adding a pop of color to the otherwise monochromatic landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer.
